name: src/index.js
src/modules/colorconverter.js
ColorConverter
description: Helpful utilities for dealing with colors.

name: getRGB
description: Will get the red green and blue values of any color string.

unknown.tagValue: {array} - array containing the red, green, and blue values

params.name: color
params.description: the color to obtain the red, green and blue values of. Can be in any of these formats: #fff, #ffffff, rgb, rgba

return.description: array containing the red, green, and blue values

name: darkenColor
description: Will get the darken the color by a certain percent

params.name: color
params.description: Can be in any of these formats: #fff, #ffffff, rgb, rgba

params.name: percent
params.description: percent to darken the color by (0-100)

name: lightenColor
description: Will get the lighten the color by a certain percent

params.name: color
params.description: Can be in any of these formats: #fff, #ffffff, rgb, rgba

params.name: percent
params.description: percent to lighten the color by (0-100)

name: rgbToAlpha
description: Converts a color to rgba format string

params.name: color
params.description: Can be in any of these formats: #fff, #ffffff, rgb, rgba

params.name: alpha
params.description: alpha level for the new color

name: src/modules/contextmenu.js
Menu
description: Main menu class for creating custom context menus.

params.name: scroll
params.description: should this menu be a scrolling menu (usually only used for submenus)

name: addGroup
description: Adds an item group to the menu. The group should already be populated.

params.name: contextGroup
params.description: group to add to the menu

name: addItems
description:
Adds items to the context menu directly. It is recommended to add to a group and use 
{@link PluginContextMenu.Menu#addGroup} instead to behave as natively as possible.

params.name: contextItems
params.description: list of items to add to the context menu

name: show
description:
Shows the menu at a specific x and y position. This generally comes from the
pointer position on a right click event.

params.name: x
params.description: x coordinate for the menu to show at

params.name: y
params.description: y coordinate for the menu to show at

name: removeMenu
description: Allows you to remove the menu.

name: attachTo
description:
Used to attach a menu to a menu item. This is how to create a submenu.
If using {@link PluginContextMenu.SubMenuItem} then you do not need
to call this function as it is done automatically. If you want to attach
a submenu to an existing Discord context menu, then you should use this
method.

params.name: menuItem
params.description: item to attach to

name: ItemGroup
description: Class that represents a group of menu items.

name: constructor
description: Creates an item group.

name: addItems
description: This is the method of adding menu items to a menu group.

params.name: contextItems
params.description: list of context menu items to add to this group

unknown.tagValue: {HTMLElement} returns the DOM node for the group

return.description: returns the DOM node for the group

name: MenuItem
description: Base class for all other menu items.

params.name: label
params.description: label to show on the menu item

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the item

params.name: options.danger
params.description: should the item show as danger

params.name: options.callback
params.description: callback for when it is clicked

name: TextItem
description: Creates a text menu item that can have a hint.

params.name: label
params.description: label to show on the menu item

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the item

params.name: options.hint
params.description: hint to show on the item (usually used for key combos)

params.name: options.danger
params.description: should the item show as danger

params.name: options.callback
params.description: callback for when it is clicked

name: ImageItem
description: Creates an image menu item that can have an image.

params.name: label
params.description: label to show on the menu item

params.name: imageSrc
params.description: link to the image to embed

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the item

params.name: options.hint
params.description: hint to show on the item (usually used for key combos)

params.name: options.danger
params.description: should the item show as danger

params.name: options.callback
params.description: callback for when it is clicked

name: SubMenuItem
description: Creates a menu item with an attached submenu.

params.name: label
params.description: label to show on the menu item

params.name: subMenu
params.description: context menu that should be attached to this item

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the item

params.name: options.hint
params.description: hint to show on the item (usually used for key combos)

params.name: options.danger
params.description: should the item show as danger

params.name: options.callback
params.description: callback for when it is clicked

name: ToggleItem
description: Creates a menu item with a checkbox.

params.name: label
params.description: label to show on the menu item

params.name: checked
params.description: should the item start out checked

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the item

params.name: options.hint
params.description: hint to show on the item (usually used for key combos)

params.name: options.danger
params.description: should the item show as danger

params.name: options.callback
params.description: callback for when it is clicked

params.name: options.onChange
params.description: callback for when the checkbox changes

name: src/modules/discordapi.js

types: {"_getModule": function, "ChannelSelector": function, "MessageActions": function, "MessageParser": function, "MessageStore": function, "EmojiUtils": function, "PermissionUtils": function, "SortedGuildStore": function, "PrivateChannelActions": function, "GuildMemberStore": function, "GuildChannelsStore": function, "MemberCountStore": function, "GuildActions": function, "NavigationUtils": function, "GuildPermissions": function, "DiscordConstants": function, "ChannelStore": function, "GuildStore": function, "SelectedGuildStore": function, "SelectedChannelStore": function, "UserStore": function, "RelationshipStore": function, "RelationshipManager": function, "DiscordPermissions": function}

name: src/modules/DiscordClassModules.js
DiscordClasses
description:
Proxy for all the class packages, allows us to safely attempt
to retrieve nested things without error. Also wraps the class in
{@link module:DOMHelpers.ClassName} which adds features but can still
be used in native function.

name: DiscordSelectors
description:
Gives us a way to retrieve the internal classes as selectors without
needing to concatenate strings or use string templates. Wraps the
selector in {@link module:DOMHelpers.Selector} which adds features but can 
still be used in native function.

name: src/modules/DiscordModules.js
content:
/**
 * A large list of known and useful webpack modules internal to Discord.
 * Click the filename below to see the whole list.
 * @module DiscordModules
 * @version 0.0.1
 */
import Utilities from "./utilities";
import {WebpackModules} from "./webpackmodules";

export default Utilities.memoizeObject({
    get React() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("createElement", "cloneElement");},
    get ReactDOM() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("render", "findDOMNode");},
    get Events() {return WebpackModules.getByPrototypes("setMaxListeners", "emit");},

    /* Guild Info, Stores, and Utilities */
    get GuildStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getGuild");},
    get SortedGuildStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getSortedGuilds");},
    get SelectedGuildStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getLastSelectedGuildId");},
    get GuildSync() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getSyncedGuilds");},
    get GuildInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getAcronym");},
    get GuildChannelsStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getChannels", "getDefaultChannel");},
    get GuildMemberStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getMember");},
    get MemberCountStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getMemberCounts");},
    get GuildEmojiStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getEmojis");},
    get GuildActions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("markGuildAsRead");},
    get GuildPermissions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getGuildPermissions");},

    /* Channel Store & Actions */
    get ChannelStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getChannels", "getDMFromUserId");},
    get SelectedChannelStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getLastSelectedChannelId");},
    get ChannelActions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("selectChannel");},
    get PrivateChannelActions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("openPrivateChannel");},
    get ChannelSelector() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("selectGuild", "selectChannel");},

    /* Current User Info, State and Settings */
    get UserInfoStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getToken");},
    get UserSettingsStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("guildPositions");},
    get AccountManager() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("register", "login");},
    get UserSettingsUpdater() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("updateRemoteSettings");},
    get OnlineWatcher() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("isOnline");},
    get CurrentUserIdle() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getIdleTime");},
    get RelationshipStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("isBlocked");},
    get RelationshipManager() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("addRelationship");},
    get MentionStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getMentions");},

    /* User Stores and Utils */
    get UserStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getCurrentUser");},
    get UserStatusStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getStatuses");},
    get UserTypingStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("isTyping");},
    get UserActivityStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getActivity");},
    get UserNameResolver() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getName");},

    /* Emoji Store and Utils */
    get EmojiInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("isEmojiDisabled");},
    get EmojiUtils() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getGuildEmoji");},
    get EmojiStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getByCategory", "EMOJI_NAME_RE");},

    /* Invite Store and Utils */
    get InviteStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getInvites");},
    get InviteResolver() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("findInvite");},
    get InviteActions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("acceptInvite");},

    /* Discord Objects & Utils */
    get DiscordConstants() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("Permissions", "ActivityTypes", "StatusTypes");},
    get Permissions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getHighestRole");},
    get ColorConverter() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("hex2int");},
    get ColorShader() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("darken");},
    get ClassResolver() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getClass");},
    get ButtonData() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("ButtonSizes");},
    get IconNames() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("IconNames");},
    get NavigationUtils() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("transitionTo", "replaceWith", "getHistory");},

    /* Discord Messages */
    get MessageStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getMessages");},
    get MessageActions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("jumpToMessage", "_sendMessage");},
    get MessageQueue() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("enqueue");},
    get MessageParser() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("createMessage", "parse", "unparse");},

    /* In-Game Overlay */
    get OverlayUserPopoutSettings() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("openUserPopout");},
    get OverlayUserPopoutInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getOpenedUserPopout");},

    /* Experiments */
    get ExperimentStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getExperimentOverrides");},
    get ExperimentsManager() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("isDeveloper");},
    get CurrentExperiment() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getExperimentId");},

    /* Images, Avatars and Utils */
    get ImageResolver() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getUserAvatarURL");},
    get ImageUtils() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getSizedImageSrc");},
    get AvatarDefaults() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getUserAvatarURL", "DEFAULT_AVATARS");},

    /* Drag & Drop */
    get DNDActions() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("beginDrag");},
    get DNDSources() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("addTarget");},
    get DNDObjects() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("DragSource");},

    /* Electron & Other Internals with Utils*/
    get ElectronModule() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("setBadge");},
    get Dispatcher() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("dirtyDispatch");},
    get PathUtils() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("hasBasename");},
    get NotificationModule() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("showNotification");},
    get RouterModule() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("Router");},
    get APIModule() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getAPIBaseURL");},
    get AnalyticEvents() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("AnalyticEventConfigs");},
    get KeyGenerator() {return WebpackModules.getByRegex(/"binary"/);},
    get Buffers() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("Buffer", "kMaxLength");},
    get DeviceStore() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getDevices");},
    get SoftwareInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("os");},
    get CurrentContext() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("setTagsContext");},

    /* Media Stuff (Audio/Video) */
    get MediaDeviceInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("Codecs", "SUPPORTED_BROWSERS");},
    get MediaInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getOutputVolume");},
    get MediaEngineInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("MediaEngineFeatures");},
    get VoiceInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("EchoCancellation");},
    get VideoStream() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getVideoStream");},
    get SoundModule() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("playSound");},

    /* Window, DOM, HTML */
    get WindowInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("isFocused", "windowSize");},
    get TagInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("VALID_TAG_NAMES");},
    get DOMInfo() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("canUseDOM");},
    get HTMLUtils() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("htmlFor", "sanitizeUrl");},

    /* Locale/Location and Time */
    get LocaleManager() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("setLocale");},
    get Moment() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("parseZone");},
    get LocationManager() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("createLocation");},
    get Timestamps() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("fromTimestamp");},

    /* Strings and Utils */
    get Strings() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("Messages").Messages;},
    get StringFormats() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("a", "z");},
    get StringUtils() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("toASCII");},

    /* URLs and Utils */
    get URLParser() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("Url", "parse");},
    get ExtraURLs() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("getArticleURL");},

    /* DOM/React Components */
    /* ==================== */
    get UserSettingsWindow() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("open", "updateAccount");},
    get LayerManager() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("popLayer", "pushLayer");},
    get Tooltips() {return WebpackModules.find(m => m.hide && m.show && !m.search && !m.submit && !m.search && !m.activateRagingDemon && !m.dismiss);},

    /* Modals */
    get ModalStack() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("push", "update", "pop", "popWithKey");},
    get UserProfileModals() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("fetchMutualFriends", "setSection");},
    get ConfirmModal() {return WebpackModules.getByPrototypes("handleCancel", "handleSubmit", "handleMinorConfirm");},

    /* Popouts */
    get PopoutStack() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("open", "close", "closeAll");},
    get PopoutOpener() {return WebpackModules.getByProps("openPopout");},
    get EmojiPicker() {return WebpackModules.getByPrototypes("onHoverEmoji", "selectEmoji");},

    /* Context Menus */
    get ContextMenuActions() {return WebpackModules.getByRegex(/CONTEXT_MENU_CLOSE/, c => c.close);},
    get ContextMenuItemsGroup() {return WebpackModules.getByRegex(/itemGroup/);},
    get ContextMenuItem() {return WebpackModules.getByRegex(/\.label\b.*\.hint\b.*\.action\b/);},

    /* In-Message Links */
    get ExternalLink() {return WebpackModules.getByRegex(/\.trusted\b/);},
});

name: src/modules/domhelpers.js
DOMHelpers
description: Helpful utilities for dealing with DOM operations.

name: indexInParent
description: Find which index in children a certain node is. Similar to jQuery's `$.index()`

params.name: node
params.description: the node to find its index in parent

name: insertAfter
description: Insert after a specific element, similar to jQuery's `element.after(newElement)`

params.name: newNode
params.description: the node to insert

params.name: referenceNode
params.description: node to insert after in the tree

name: Selector
description: Representation of a Selector *

params.name: classname
params.description: class to create selector for

name: toString
description: Returns the raw selector, this is how native function get the value.

name: valueOf
description: Returns the raw selector, this is how native function get the value.

name: child
description: Adds another selector as a direct child `>` to this one.

params.name: other
params.description: Selector to add as child

name: adjacent
description: Adds another selector as a adjacent sibling `+` to this one.

params.name: other
params.description: Selector to add as adjacent sibling

name: sibling
description: Adds another selector as a general sibling `~` to this one.

params.name: other
params.description: Selector to add as sibling

name: descend
description: Adds another selector as a descendent `(space)` to this one.

params.name: other
params.description: Selector to add as descendent

name: and
description: Adds another selector to this one via `,`.

params.name: other
params.description: Selector to add

name: ClassName
description: Representation of a Class Name *

params.name: name
params.description: name of the class to represent

name: add
description: Concatenates new class names to the current one using spaces.

params.name: classNames
params.description: list of class names to add to this class name

name: toString
description: Returns the raw class name, this is how native function get the value.

name: valueOf
description: Returns the raw class name, this is how native function get the value.

name: selector
description: Returns the classname represented as {@link DOMHelpers.Selector}.

unknown.tagValue: {DOMHelpers.Selector} selector representation of this class name.

return.description: selector representation of this class name.

name: src/modules/InternalUtilities.js
addOnSwitchListener
description:
Similar to {@link PluginUtilities.onSwitchObserver} but this uses electron
web contents and not observers. This can be more efficient on worse systems
than the observer based method.

params.name: callback
params.description: basic callback to happen on channel switch

name: removeOnSwitchListener
description: Removes the listener added by {@link InternalUtilities.addOnSwitchListener}.

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to remove from the listener list

name: src/modules/logger.js
LogTypes
description: Simple logger for the lib and plugins.

types: {"err": string, "error": string, "dbg": string, "debug": string, "log": string, "warn": string, "info": string}

name: err
description: Logs an error using a collapsed error group with stacktrace.

params.name: module
params.description: Name of the calling module.

params.name: message
params.description: Message or error to have logged.

params.name: error
params.description: Optional error to log with the message.

name: warn
description: Logs a warning message/

params.name: module
params.description: Name of the calling module.

params.name: message
params.description: Message to have logged.

name: info
description: Logs an informational message.

params.name: module
params.description: Name of the calling module.

params.name: message
params.description: Message to have logged.

name: debug
description: Logs used for debugging purposes.

params.name: module
params.description: Name of the calling module.

params.name: message
params.description: Message to have logged.

name: log
description: Logs strings using different console levels and a module label.

params.name: module
params.description: Name of the calling module.

params.name: message
params.description: Message to have logged.

params.name: type
params.description: Type of log to use in console.

name: src/modules/modules.js
src/modules/patcher.js
Patcher
getPatchesByCaller
description: Returns all the patches done by a specific caller

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the patch caller

name: unpatchAll
description:
Unpatches all patches passed, or when a string is passed unpatches all
patches done by that specific caller.

params.name: patches
params.description: Either an array of patches to unpatch or a caller name

name: before
description:
This method patches onto another function, allowing your code to run beforehand.
Using this, you are also able to modify the incoming arguments before the original method is run.

params.name: caller
params.description: Name of the caller of the patch function. Using this you can undo all patches with the same name using {@link Patcher#unpatchAll}. Use `""` if you don't care.

params.name: moduleToPatch
params.description: Object with the function to be patched. Can also patch an object's prototype.

params.name: functionName
params.description: Name of the method to be patched

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to run before the original method

params.name: options
params.description: Object used to pass additional options.

params.name: options.displayName
params.description: You can provide meaningful name for class/object provided in `what` param for logging purposes. By default, this function will try to determine name automatically.

params.name: options.forcePatch
params.description: Set to `true` to patch even if the function doesnt exist. (Adds noop function in place).

return.description: Function with no arguments and no return value that should be called to cancel (unpatch) this patch. You should save and run it when your plugin is stopped.

name: after
description:
This method patches onto another function, allowing your code to run instead.
Using this, you are also able to modify the return value, using the return of your code instead.

params.name: caller
params.description: Name of the caller of the patch function. Using this you can undo all patches with the same name using {@link Patcher#unpatchAll}. Use `""` if you don't care.

params.name: moduleToPatch
params.description: Object with the function to be patched. Can also patch an object's prototype.

params.name: functionName
params.description: Name of the method to be patched

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to run instead of the original method

params.name: options
params.description: Object used to pass additional options.

params.name: options.displayName
params.description: You can provide meaningful name for class/object provided in `what` param for logging purposes. By default, this function will try to determine name automatically.

params.name: options.forcePatch
params.description: Set to `true` to patch even if the function doesnt exist. (Adds noop function in place).

return.description: Function with no arguments and no return value that should be called to cancel (unpatch) this patch. You should save and run it when your plugin is stopped.

name: instead
description:
This method patches onto another function, allowing your code to run afterwards.
Using this, you are also able to modify the return value, using the return of your code instead.

params.name: caller
params.description: Name of the caller of the patch function. Using this you can undo all patches with the same name using {@link Patcher#unpatchAll}. Use `""` if you don't care.

params.name: moduleToPatch
params.description: Object with the function to be patched. Can also patch an object's prototype.

params.name: functionName
params.description: Name of the method to be patched

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to run after the original method

params.name: options
params.description: Object used to pass additional options.

params.name: options.displayName
params.description: You can provide meaningful name for class/object provided in `what` param for logging purposes. By default, this function will try to determine name automatically.

params.name: options.forcePatch
params.description: Set to `true` to patch even if the function doesnt exist. (Adds noop function in place).

return.description: Function with no arguments and no return value that should be called to cancel (unpatch) this patch. You should save and run it when your plugin is stopped.

name: pushChildPatch
description:
This method patches onto another function, allowing your code to run before, instead or after the original function.
Using this you are able to modify the incoming arguments before the original function is run as well as the return
value before the original function actually returns.

params.name: caller
params.description: Name of the caller of the patch function. Using this you can undo all patches with the same name using {@link Patcher#unpatchAll}. Use `""` if you don't care.

params.name: moduleToPatch
params.description: Object with the function to be patched. Can also patch an object's prototype.

params.name: functionName
params.description: Name of the method to be patched

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to run after the original method

params.name: options
params.description: Object used to pass additional options.

params.name: options.type
params.description: Determines whether to run the function `before`, `instead`, or `after` the original.

params.name: options.displayName
params.description: You can provide meaningful name for class/object provided in `what` param for logging purposes. By default, this function will try to determine name automatically.

params.name: options.forcePatch
params.description: Set to `true` to patch even if the function doesnt exist. (Adds noop function in place).

return.description: Function with no arguments and no return value that should be called to cancel (unpatch) this patch. You should save and run it when your plugin is stopped.

name: src/modules/permissions.js
DiscordPermissions
description:
Class representing Discord's permissions system.

This will soon be rewritten in a much simpler manner using internals.

name: src/modules/pluginsettings.js
getAccentColor
description: Attempts to retreive the accent color of native settings items in rgba format.

name: ControlGroup
description: Grouping of controls for easier management in settings panels.

params.name: groupName
params.description: title for the group of settings

params.name: callback
params.description: callback called on settings changed

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the group

params.name: options.collapsible
params.description: determines if the group should be collapsible

params.name: options.shown
params.description: determines if the group should be expanded by default

params.name: nodes
params.description: list of nodes to add to the group container

params.name: node
params.description: node to attach the group to.

name: Textbox
description: Creates a simple textbox settings.

params.name: label
params.description: title for the setting

params.name: help
params.description: description of the setting

params.name: value
params.description: default value of the setting

params.name: placeholder
params.description: placeholder text for when the textbox is empty

params.name: callback
params.description: callback fired on textbox change

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the input field itself

name: ColorPicker
description:
Creates a color picker using chromium's built in color picker
as a base. Input and output using hex strings.

params.name: label
params.description: title for the setting

params.name: help
params.description: description of the setting

params.name: value
params.description: default value of the setting in hex format

params.name: callback
params.description: callback fired on color change

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the input field itself

name: Slider
description: Creates a slider where the user can select a single number from a predefined range.

params.name: settingLabel
params.description: title for the setting

params.name: help
params.description: description of the setting

params.name: min
params.description: minimum value allowed

params.name: max
params.description: maximum value allowed

params.name: step
params.description: granularity between values

params.name: value
params.description: default value of the setting

params.name: callback
params.description: callback fired on slider release

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the input field itself

name: setLabelUnit
description: Adds a unit to the value label

params.name: unit
params.description: unit to add to the label (e.g. "%")

name: Switch
description: Creates a checkbox in the style of a standard Discord switch.

params.name: label
params.description: title for the setting

params.name: help
params.description: description of the setting

params.name: isChecked
params.description: determines if the checkbox is checked by default

params.name: callback
params.description: callback fired on change

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the input field itself

name: PillButton
description:
Creates a PillButton where the left and right side have their own label.
It is important to note that the checked property here follows the same
standard as a normal Discord switch. That is to say if the value is true
then right side was selected, if the value is false then the left side 
was selected.

params.name: label
params.description: title for the setting

params.name: help
params.description: description of the setting

params.name: leftLabel
params.description: label for the option on the left

params.name: rightLabel
params.description: label for the option on the right

params.name: isRightSelected
params.description: determines if the right side is selected. (true = right side, false = left side)

params.name: callback
params.description: callback fired on switch change (true = right side, false = left side)

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the input field itself

name: src/modules/PluginUpdateUtilities.js
createUpdateButton
description:
Creates the update button found in the plugins page of BetterDiscord
settings. Returned button will already have listeners to create the tooltip.

name: checkUpdate
description:
Will check for updates and automatically show or remove the update notice
bar based on the internal result. Better not to call this directly and to
instead use {@link PluginUtilities.checkForUpdate}.

params.name: pluginName
params.description: name of the plugin to check

params.name: updateLink
params.description: link to the raw text version of the plugin

name: showUpdateNotice
description:
Will show the update notice top bar seen in Discord. Better not to call
this directly and to instead use {@link PluginUtilities.checkForUpdate}.

params.name: pluginName
params.description: name of the plugin

params.name: updateLink
params.description: link to the raw text version of the plugin

name: downloadPlugin

params.name: pluginName
params.description: name of the plugin to download

params.name: updateLink
params.description: link to the raw text version of the plugin

name: removeUpdateNotice
description:
Will remove the plugin from the update notice top bar seen in Discord.
Better not to call this directly and to instead use {@link PluginUtilities.checkForUpdate}.

params.name: pluginName
params.description: name of the plugin

name: PluginUpdateUtilities
description: Functions that check for and update existing plugins.

name: src/modules/PluginUtilities.js
getCurrentServer
description: Gets the server the user is currently in.

unknown.tagValue: {object} returns Discord's internal object representing the server

return.description: returns Discord's internal object representing the server

unknown.tagValue: if the user is in a server

return.description: if the user is in a server

name: getCurrentUser
description: Gets the current user.

unknown.tagValue: {object} returns Discord's internal object representing the user

return.description: returns Discord's internal object representing the user

name: getAllUsers
description: Gets the list of members in the current server.

unknown.tagValue: {array} returns an array of Discord's internal object representing the members.

return.description: returns an array of Discord's internal object representing the members.

name: loadData
description: Loads data through BetterDiscord's API.

unknown.tagValue: {object} the combined saved and default data

params.name: name
params.description: name for the file (usually plugin name)

params.name: key
params.description: which key the data is saved under

params.name: defaultData
params.description: default data to populate the object with

return.description: the combined saved and default data

name: saveData
description: Saves data through BetterDiscord's API.

params.name: name
params.description: name for the file (usually plugin name)

params.name: key
params.description: which key the data should be saved under

params.name: data
params.description: data to save

name: loadSettings
description: Loads settings through BetterDiscord's API.

unknown.tagValue: {object} the combined saved and default settings

params.name: name
params.description: name for the file (usually plugin name)

params.name: defaultData
params.description: default data to populate the object with

return.description: the combined saved and default settings

name: saveSettings
description: Saves settings through BetterDiscord's API.

params.name: name
params.description: name for the file (usually plugin name)

params.name: data
params.description: settings to save

name: checkForUpdate
description:
Checks for updates for the specified plugin at the specified link. The final
parameter should link to the raw text of the plugin and will compare semantic
versions.

params.name: pluginName
params.description: name of the plugin

params.name: currentVersion
params.description: current version (semantic versioning only)

params.name: updateURL
params.description: url to check for update

name: showToast
description:
Shows a simple toast, similar to Android, centered over 
the textarea if it exists, and center screen otherwise.
Vertically it shows towards the bottom like in Android.

params.name: content
params.description: The string to show in the toast.

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the toast

params.name: options.type
params.description: Changes the type of the toast stylistically and semantically. Choices: "", "info", "success", "danger"/"error", "warning"/"warn".

params.name: options.icon
params.description: Determines whether the icon should show corresponding to the type. A toast without type will always have no icon.

params.name: options.timeout
params.description: Adjusts the time (in ms) the toast should be shown for before disappearing automatically.

name: getPluginsFolder
description: Get the full path to the plugins folder.

unknown.tagValue: {string} full path to the plugins folder

return.description: full path to the plugins folder

name: getThemesFolder
description: Get the full path to the themes folder.

unknown.tagValue: {string} full path to the themes folder

return.description: full path to the themes folder

name: formatString
description:
Format strings with placeholders (`${placeholder}`) into full strings.
Quick example: `PluginUtilities.formatString("Hello, ${user}", {user: "Zerebos"})`
would return "Hello, Zerebos".

params.name: string
params.description: string to format

params.name: values
params.description: object literal of placeholders to replacements

name: createSwitchObserver
description: Creates a MutationObserver observing for the Discord channel switch.

unknown.tagValue: {MutationObserver} the observer observing for channel switch

params.name: plugin
params.description: the plugin with a `onChannelSwitch()` function

return.description: the observer observing for channel switch

name: onSwitchObserver
description: Creates a MutationObserver observing for the Discord channel switch.

unknown.tagValue: {MutationObserver} the observer observing for channel switch

params.name: onSwitch
params.description: function to call on channel switch

return.description: the observer observing for channel switch

name: PluginUtilities
description: A series of useful functions for BetterDiscord plugins.

name: src/modules/reacttools.js
getReactInstance
description: Grabs the react internal instance of a specific node.

params.name: node
params.description: node to obtain react instance of

name: getReactProperty
description:
Grabs a value from the react internal instance. Allows you to grab
long depth values safely without accessing no longer valid properties.

params.name: node
params.description: node to obtain react instance of

params.name: path
params.description: path to the requested value

return.description: the value requested or undefined if not found.

name: getOwnerInstance
description:
Grabs a value from the react internal instance. Allows you to grab
long depth values safely without accessing no longer valid properties.

params.name: node
params.description: node to obtain react instance of

params.name: options
params.description: options for the search

params.name: options.include
params.description: list of items to include from the search

params.name: options.exclude
params.description: list of items to exclude from the search

return.description: the owner instance or undefined if not found.

name: src/modules/tooltips.js
PluginTooltip
description: Custom tooltip, not using internals.

params.name: node
params.description: DOM node to monitor and show the tooltip on

params.name: tip
params.description: string to show in the tooltip

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the tooltip

params.name: options.style
params.description: correlates to the discord styling

params.name: options.side
params.description: can be any of top, right, bottom, left

params.name: options.preventFlip
params.description: prevents moving the tooltip to the opposite side if it is too big or goes offscreen

name: canShowAbove
description: Boolean representing if the tooltip will fit on screen above the element

name: canShowBelow
description: Boolean representing if the tooltip will fit on screen below the element

name: canShowLeft
description: Boolean representing if the tooltip will fit on screen to the left of the element

name: canShowRight
description: Boolean representing if the tooltip will fit on screen to the right of the element

name: hide
description: Hides the tooltip. Automatically called on mouseleave.

name: show
description: Shows the tooltip. Automatically called on mouseenter. Will attempt to flip if position was wrong.

name: showAbove
description: Force showing the tooltip above the node.

name: showBelow
description: Force showing the tooltip below the node.

name: showLeft
description: Force showing the tooltip to the left of the node.

name: showRight
description: Force showing the tooltip to the right of the node.

name: NativeTooltip
description: Tooltips done using Discord's internals.

params.name: node
params.description: DOM node to monitor and show the tooltip on

params.name: tip
params.description: string to show in the tooltip

params.name: options
params.description: additional options for the tooltip

params.name: options.style
params.description: correlates to the discord styling

params.name: options.side
params.description: can be any of top, right, bottom, left

params.name: options.preventFlip
params.description: prevents moving the tooltip to the opposite side if it is too big or goes offscreen

name: hide
description: Hides the tooltip. Automatically called on mouseleave.

name: show
description: Shows the tooltip. Automatically called on mouseenter.

name: src/modules/utilities.js
stableSort
description: Stably sorts arrays since `.sort()` has issues.

params.name: list
params.description: array to sort

params.name: comparator
params.description: comparator to sort by

name: memoizeObject
description: Generates an automatically memoizing version of an object.

unknown.tagValue: {Proxy} the proxy to the object that memoizes properties

params.name: object
params.description: object to memoize

return.description: the proxy to the object that memoizes properties

name: suppressErrors
description: Wraps the method in a `try..catch` block.

params.name: method
params.description: method to wrap

params.name: description
params.description: description of method

name: isNil
description: This only exists because Samo relied on lodash being there... fuck lodash.

params.name: anything
params.description: whatever you want

name: src/modules/webpackmodules.js
getModule
description: Finds a module using a filter function.

params.name: filter
params.description: A function to use to filter modules

params.name: first
params.description: Whether to return only the first matching module

name: getModuleByName
description: Finds a module by its name.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the module

params.name: fallback
params.description: A function to use to filter modules if not finding a known module

name: getByDisplayName
description: Finds a module by its display name.

params.name: name
params.description: The display name of the module

name: getByRegex
description: Finds a module using its code.

params.name: regex
params.description: A regular expression to use to filter modules

params.name: first
params.description: Whether to return the only the first matching module

name: getByPrototypes
description: Finds a single module using properties on its prototype.

params.name: prototypes
params.description: Properties to use to filter modules

name: getAllByPrototypes
description: Finds all modules with a set of properties of its prototype.

params.name: prototypes
params.description: Properties to use to filter modules

name: getByProps
description: Finds a single module using its own properties.

params.name: props
params.description: Properties to use to filter modules

name: getAllByProps
description: Finds all modules with a set of properties.

params.name: props
params.description: Properties to use to filter modules

name: require
description: Discord's __webpack_require__ function.

name: getAllModules
description: Returns all loaded modules.

name: src/structs/settings/index.js
content: export * from "./settingfield";

SettingField

params.name: helptext

params.name: inputData

params.name: callback

description: Performing this will prevent the default callbacks from working!

export const $ = window.$;
export const jQuery = window.jQuery;

name: src/vendor/vendor.js
content: export * from "./jquery";

{
  "name": "pluginlibrary",
  "version": "0.5.6",
  "description": "Zere's library for BetterDiscord plugins.",
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jsdoc": "^3.5.5",
    "raw-loader": "^0.5.1",
    "webpack": "^4.8.3",
    "webpack-cli": "^2.1.3"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "build": "webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --colors",
    "prod": "webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --colors && jsdoc -c jsdoc.config.json"
  },
  "author": "Zerebos",
  "license": "ISC"
}
